abouts: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for leveraging cutting-edge technology to build *innovative and elegant solutions*.

Although I hold a degree in Electronics Engineering, my *strong passion* for programming led me to transition into the software development industry. To bridge the gap, I *proactively learn* coding knowledge and adopted best practices to align myself with industry demands.

With the support of AI-powered tools like *ChatGPT, AI-assisted IDEs* such as *Cursor and Trae*, I am *confident* in my ability to quickly adapt to new technology and new programming languages, ensuring continuous growth and excellence in my development journey.
